name: expo
title: Expo
description: Manage your expo.dev Projects, Apple Devices and Enviroment Variables
author: patrick-web

commands.name: apple-devices
commands.title: Manage Apple Devices
commands.subtitle: Expo
commands.description: View, Create and Edit apple devices

commands.name: manage-envs
commands.title: Environment Variables
commands.subtitle: Expo
commands.description: View, Create, Edit and Delete environment variables

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
